title: THE YOUNG KING TO MARGARET LADY BROOKE

book.title: A House of Pomegranates
book.description: 简介： It was the night before the day fixed for his coronation, and the young King was sitting alone in his beautiful chamber. His courtiers had all taken their leave of him, bowing their heads to the ground, according to the ceremonious usage of the day,...
